projects.title: Projects
projects.heroTitle: AI-powered analysis workflows that extract insights from your documents
projects.heroDescription:
Upload documents, images, videos, audio and more. AI automatically analyzes your content.
Find what you need instantly with vector and hybrid search.
projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
projects.deleteConfirmMessage:
Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
This action cannot be undone.
projects.createFirst: Create your first project to get started
projects.languageTooltip: Documents will be analyzed in this language

documents.title: Documents
documents.dragDrop: Drag and drop files or click to upload
documents.supportedFormats: Supports documents (PDF, DOC, TXT), images (PNG, JPG, GIF, TIFF), videos (MP4, MOV, AVI), and audio files (MP3, WAV, FLAC) up to 500MB
documents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
documents.useBdaDescription: Enable Bedrock Document Analysis for advanced document understanding. Recommended for complex documents with tables, charts, or multi-column layouts.

workflow.title: Workflow
workflow.noAiAnalysis: No AI analysis for this segment
workflow.noVideoAvailable: No video available for this segment
workflow.noImageAvailable: No image available for this segment

ocr.title: OCR Settings
ocr.languageHint: Select the primary language of documents in this project
ocr.languageTooltip: Language used for OCR text recognition. This is separate from the AI document analysis language.
ocr.textlineOrientationDesc: Detect and handle rotated text lines (PP-OCRv5 only)

pp-structurev3.name: PP-StructureV3
pp-structurev3.description: Document structure analysis with table detection

analysis.title: Document Analysis Instructions
analysis.placeholder:
Enter custom instructions for document analysis (optional)

Example:
- Focus on extracting financial data and dates
- Pay special attention to signature blocks
- Extract all table data in structured format
analysis.hint: Custom instructions to guide document analysis.

chat.title: Chat
chat.uploadAndAsk: Upload documents and ask questions about them
chat.enterToSend: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
chat.welcomeDescription: Ask questions about your uploaded documents

suggestions.explain: Explain the key points of this document
suggestions.extract: Extract important information from this document

chat.deleteSessionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action cannot be undone.
chat.deleteArtifactConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this artifact? This action cannot be undone.

agent.name: Name
agent.promptPlaceholder:
# Financial Document Analyst

You are a financial document analysis expert.

## Role
- Extract key financial metrics and figures
- Identify important dates and deadlines
- Summarize contract terms and conditions

## Output Format
- Use structured tables for numerical data
- Highlight critical information
- Provide Korean translation when needed
agent.changeConfirmMessage: Changing agent will start a new conversation. Current conversation will be saved in history.
agent.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

artifacts.heroTitle: Code, documents, and insights generated by AI
artifacts.heroDescription:
Browse and manage all artifacts created during your conversations.
Quickly copy, download, or organize your generated content.
artifacts.noArtifactsDescription: Artifacts generated during chat conversations will appear here.
